messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] ALSO BEWARE ONGOING SCAM: INVENTORS SUBMISSION
messages.msgSnippet: This reminds me: If anyone knows an inventor or has a darling inventor (di?) in the family, those late night invention submission/marketing comapnies are a
messages.messageBody:
This reminds me:

If anyone knows an inventor or has a darling inventor (di?) in the family, those late night invention submission/marketing comapnies are a scam. The USA FTC took them on and it's illegal there.

Here in Canada, the goberment is staying with "buyer beware." Not illegal, because they do give you something - it's just Grade A1 useless information.

Having worked with inventors who dumped $15,000 (i.e. all their retirement money) into these people, I love to tell anyone who will listen.

Thanks for listening and spread the word on these predators!

Tim T


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
